name.text: ICoLearn - Internet and collaborative based learning methodologies toolbox for digital transformation and sustainable growth |<b> Project No.: 101127224

accordion.text-i: Public university with administrative and financial autonomy.It was founded in Aug 26th, 1940.Position 19th in best universities en Latin America.Renowned as a social mobility factor in CR’s societyThe main campus is located in center of San José, Costa Rica.It has 12 locations, spread out along the CR territoryStudent population 43.000Yearly admission 9.500, Yearly graduations 6.50013 Faculties, 48 Schools, 538 Academic options

relevant.title: OTHER RELEVANT INFORMATION
relevant.info: The main campus is located in center of San José, Costa Rica. It has 12 locations, spread out along the CR territory. The larger ones are called “Sedes” and the smaller ones are called “Recintos”. San José San Ramón Grecia Liberia Santa Cruz Puntarenas Limón Guápiles Turrialba Golfito Alajuela Paraíso
